sentences.en: A leopard hunts alone, and an injured leopard cannot hunt.
sentences.cn: 豹向来单独猎食，所以如果受伤了就无法捕猎。

sentences.en: Cash alone will not make Eastern Europe's banks viable.
sentences.cn: 仅靠现金不能使东欧的银行维持下去。

sentences.en: Don't leave a child alone in a room with an open fire.
sentences.cn: 房间里有裸露的明火时，不要让孩子独处其中。

sentences.en: He had always been an outcast, unwanted and alone.
sentences.cn: 他一直都被视为异类，无人理睬，形单影只。

sentences.en: He knew when to leave well alone and when to interfere.
sentences.cn: 他知道什么时候该适可而止，什么时候该插手干预。

sentences.en: He was living alone in a dingy bedsit in London.
sentences.cn: 他独自一人住在伦敦一间昏暗的客卧两用出租屋里。

sentences.en: Her parting words left him feeling empty and alone.
sentences.cn: 她分手时说的话让他感觉空虚孤独。

sentences.en: I cried like a child because I felt so alone .
sentences.cn: 我感到很孤独，像个孩子似的哭了起来。

sentences.en: I feel lost and lonely in a strange town alone.
sentences.cn: 在陌生的城镇里只身一人，我感到不知所措、孤单寂寞。

sentences.en: I would have to learn, little by little, to exist alone.
sentences.cn: 我得慢慢学会独自生活。

sentences.en: I'll leave you alone here so you can mull it over.
sentences.cn: 我不打扰你了，你在这儿可以仔细考虑考虑这事儿。

sentences.en: It is best to stifle curiosity and leave birds' nests alone.
sentences.cn: 最好能克制住好奇心，不要去碰鸟巢。

sentences.en: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.cn: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.en: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.cn: 她已在这所房子里独自住了近5年。

sentences.en: She lives alone .
sentences.cn: 她一个人生活。

sentences.en: She lives alone.
sentences.cn: 她一个人生活。

sentences.en: The BBC alone is sending 300 technicians, directors and commentators.
sentences.cn: 单单英国广播公司就派出技术人员、导演、解说员等一行300人。

sentences.en: The doll-like figures in these stories are unlike anybody, let alone oneself.
sentences.cn: 这些故事中的玩偶形象跟谁都不像，更不用说像自己了。

sentences.en: They found her walking alone and depressed on the beach.
sentences.cn: 他们碰见她独自一人神色忧郁地走在海滩上。

sentences.en: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.cn: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

phrases.tran_cn: 不妨碍，不打扰（某人或物）
不打扰；不干涉；不管；不理
独自生活；一个人住；单独居住

trans.tran_cn: 独自的，孤苦伶仃的，单一的，孤独的
trans.tran_en: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
